resources.string: Sergio Cucinotta, Marco Turetta, Kia Rashjamshidi/

Marco Turetta is a 24-year-old trainee engineer who enjoys extreme ironing, rubics cube and binge-watching boxed sets. He is Fun and helpful, but can also be very lazy and a bit impatient.
He is italian who defines himself as straight. He has a degree in medicine.
Physically, marco is in pretty good shape. He is average-height with pale skin, golden hair and blue eyes.
He grew up in a working class neighbourhood. After his mother died when he was young, he was raised by his father
He is currently single. His most recent romance was with a plumber called Ellen Claudia Mcintyre, who was 12 years older than him. They broke up because marco wanted to be with somebody who laughed at more of his wanted to be with somebody jokes.
marco's best friend is a trainee doctor called Eva Ellis. They get on well most of the time. He also hangs around with Lia Hodgson and Kristina Stephenson. They enjoy vandalising bus stops together.
